lead_paragraph: After his defeat of Mrs. Clinton on Tuesday, Bernie Sanders will have a chance to prove himself in a state as racially diverse as Iowa and New Hampshire are not.

headline.print_headline: Stakes in Nevada Rise for Clinton as Caucuses Near
headline.main: Stakes in Nevada Rise for Hillary Clinton as Caucuses Near

snippet: After his defeat of Mrs. Clinton on Tuesday, Bernie Sanders will have a chance to prove himself in a state as racially diverse as Iowa and New Hampshire are not.
abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders's overwhelming victory over Hillary Clinton in New Hampshire has changed political calculus and elevated importance of Nevada caucuses, which were once believed to be afterthought in 2016 Democratic presidential nomination cycle; Nevada, which is racially diverse, will serve as test of Sanders's ability to construct winning coalition, and presents challenge to Clinton as concerns about her political strength persist.
